Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_ro5asm61&referenceId=1_ro5asm61&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Stocktube

Description: Fobi AI (TSX-V:FOBI, OTCQB:FOBIF) Senior Vice President Mike Canevaro joined Steve Darling from Proactive to share news the company has announced a new partnership with Janam Technologies. Janam uses mobile computers that are small, light and affordable to deliver barcode scanning.Canevaro telling Proactive Fobi and Janam plan to offer end-to-end mobile wallet and hardware solutions for the sports, live entertainment, hospitality, retail and healthcare sectors. Anson believes this agreement will particularly be used for venue management to improve access control, reduce fraud, gain real-time insights and enhance the customer experience.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3m05eNa
